rst in pycharm

04 Aug 2020

In order to render rst files in pycharm, you need to set up some environment variables, otherwise youâ€™ll get the error NameError: Cannot find docutils in selected interpreter. In short, you need to add

export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8  
export LANG=en_US.UTF-8

to your .bash_profile. You can then restart pycharm and it should work.

Ref: Stackoverflow

[ pycharm  doc  rst  ]
